ygData.subject: Re: Bard petition ideas (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Sean Gifford  To: eqbards@onelist.com  Date: Saturday, August 07, 1999 7:09 PM Subject: Re: [eqbards]
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Gifford <Giffords@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, August 07, 1999 7:09 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard petition ideas (Long)


>From: "Sean Gifford" <Giffords@...>
>
>Would you rather be a poor little pansy strumming his/her lute on the
street
>corner of some slum, or being a Blade swinging cuisiniart slaying big ugly
>orcs and whatnot???
>
>Gleeman, Half Elven Bard of the 15th Chorus
>EQ is a drug, and I need a fix
----------

Geez, who pee'd in your wheaties, Its called useful skills, Historically
thats what bards did, Verant has done alot of things to supplement classes
thru abilities, THIS one seems a no brainer. BTW Im a female bard, so I
have no problem with panzies, although historically many were considered
foppish at best....

Jaezebel Moonsong
Gypsy Bard of the 21st verse
